text: Lorraine Langford (November 1, 1923 - December 26, 1998) was an American homemaker and politician. Born in Platte County, Nebraska, Langford went to University of Nebraska and University of Southern California. Langford was a homemaker and lived in Kearney, Nebraska. Langford served in the Nebraska State Legislature from 1987 to 1990 and was a Republican. Langford died in a hospital in Longwood, Florida.Nebraska Legislative Manual 1988-1989-Biographical Sketch of Lorraine Langford'Former State Sen. title: Lorraine Langford
